attr.title: Operation S.T.E.E.L
attr.desc: A roguelike shmup with hand drawn graphics, procedurally generated levels, enemies, and pickups.
attr.inst: Purchase at itch.io https://leanderish.itch.io/steel "OR" Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489300/Operation_STEEL/ -Locate OperationSTEEL.pck and place it into ./operationsteel folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [itch.io](https://leanderish.itch.io/steel) "OR" [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1489300/Operation_STEEL/) -Locate OperationSTEEL.pck and place it in to ./operationsteel folder.
